long_description: Made of waxed canvas, the versatile Alite Hikari Pack can function as a backpack, shoulder bag and tote, and is ideal for cycling to the farmers market or hauling your laptop to the coffeeshop. Inspired by a Japanese fisherman's bag, the main compartment has a cinch-closure top and an insulating skirt. Interior laptop sleeve; double outside pockets. Waxed nylon-canvas is water-resistant. Alite Hikari Pack has a fabric loop for a bike light (sold separately). Closeout.
